content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

This Week in Genesis, a tasty offering of themes from Imagely, Seo Themes and StudioPress (via Restored 316).

Themes

A new photography theme from Imagely, Gridly (theme demo) for displaying your beautiful photos in a grid design.

Don't miss this! Introducing Gridly, Our Latest Photography Theme https://t.co/erzUU8j10D pic.twitter.com/sGTqQCiTq8

— Imagely (@imagely) June 2, 2017

StudioPress Pro Plus account holders rejoice, there’s a new third party theme now available, Refined Pro (theme demo) by Restored 316.

The Refined Pro Theme by @restored316 is now available. Check it out —> https://t.co/nmG6S7q2VH #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/X9ntd48ebS

— StudioPress (@studiopress) May 31, 2017

Seo Themes launches a free (for a limited time) theme, Shadow, (theme demo) inspired by Ghost.

Introducing Shadow, a new mobile-first #genesiswp blogging theme. Get it FREE (with a share) for a limited time only https://t.co/yOSV0MClB5

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) May 29, 2017

Anita is planning a few updates to her Isabelle child theme.

Coming Soon! Updated my Isabelle Child Theme. More features! https://t.co/zknKk1BNj7 #genesiswp #bloggers #fbloggers #bbloggers

— Anita C. (@TheCre8tiveDiva) May 31, 2017

And Brian Gardner’s working on something new…

Starting the design of a new #genesiswp theme for @studiopress while 35,000 feet in the air. I love my job.

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) June 2, 2017

Showcase

Sara Dunn for harborclubsh.com

Celebrating the launch of a new responsive site for Harbor Club South Haven! #GenesisWP @studiopress Showcase Pro: https://t.co/7Ud9jpLrSS pic.twitter.com/fvey6Kjkig

— Sara Dunn (@Sara11D) June 2, 2017

Podcasts

The latest episode of Rethink.fm features the always thought provoking Morten Rand-Hendriksen chatting with host Jackie D’Elia.

Episode 15: Morten Rand-Hendriksen https://t.co/fcqvGwx0kW

— Rethink FM (@rethinkfm) June 3, 2017

Eric Hamm, creator of the popular Genesis Extender Plugin and Dynamik Website Builder for Genesis, is on the WP Builds podcast this week.

Me talking about #WordPress on the @wpbuilds podcast: https://t.co/YyNY3F2OKQ #genesiswp #cobaltwp

— Eric Hamm (@EricHamm) June 1, 2017

Best of the rest

New series from Jackie D’Elia on how to build an SVG Icons system for your Genesis themes.

Enchancing SVG Icons Menu

Jesse Petersen with an update to GenesisThe.me After Entry Widget Pro plugin.

With global control over post types, GenesisThe.me After Entry Widget Pro has an update today! #genesiswp https://t.co/NHakBUPMBj

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) June 1, 2017

Anita shows you how to rename the Genesis Portfolio Pro plugin slug.

How to Rename the Genesis Portfolio Pro Slug – https://t.co/AFb7xbqBtF #wordpress #plugins #genesiswp #webdev #bloggers #photographers

— Anita C. (@TheCre8tiveDiva) June 2, 2017

Tonya Mork’s thinking about adding a Genesis day to her Profitable WordPress Developer event.

Hey, #GenesisWP, did you hear that we're talking about adding a Genesis Build Day to the @ProfitableWPDev Bootcamp? Go follow.

— Know The Code (@KnowTheCodePro) June 1, 2017

—

Got something you’d like to see in this weekly round-up?

Add it to the site and I’ll include my favourites in next week’s edition.
